content.chorus:
Onwu emego ike yan'ebe mo nwanne m
Lawa n 'udo, zuru ike n 'udo
Lakwuru Chineke na gi o
Ka izuru ike, lawanu nwannemo igaghi anwu zoo
verses:
Onwu emego ike ya onwu egbula gi o
Hara nu ya nwannem√≥ igaghi anwu ozo

Otutu okwu iga ekwu ekwu ka di gi n'onu
Hapu nu ya nwannemo igaghi anwu ozo

Umunne gi mere ihe nile ha nwere ike ime n'ebe ino
Mana mgbarigba akuzuela aka onwu we kpara gi
